> **注意**: このページはまだ日本語に翻訳されていません。以下は英語の原文です。

The overrides for a contract transaction.

## Extends

- `Omit`\<[`TransactionRequest`](/jp/sdk/content/type-aliases/TransactionRequest), `"to"` \| `"data"`\>

## Properties

| Property | Type | Description | Inherited from |
| :------ | :------ | :------ | :------ |
| `chainId?` | `null` \| [`BigNumberish`](/jp/sdk/content/type-aliases/BigNumberish) | The chain ID for the network this transaction is valid on. | `Omit.chainId` |
| `type?` | `null` \| `number` | The transaction type. Quai transactions are always type 0. | `Omit.type` |
